Data class is fixed, reasonable robust and accepting csv load profiles, 1-step functionality is depreciated currently, would like to revive it though. microgrid is iterating over steps now, steps decided in grid config now, which is better.

MESSAGE.value: added new classes for devices, to be filled through RLI research
stable again moved plots to seperate plot file added pay-as-bid config option (still empty though) seperated sorting and pricing
added trade pair matching for direct settlement between houses.
worked out payment/settlement started work on extending data to real load profiles SMART* data set included
putting profiles in the right folder

Configuration Mixin is not in action, upto 400 households to be modelled, configurarable amount of RES prosumers in the grid. Data class is fixed, reasonable robust and accepting csv load profiles, 1-step functionality is depreciated currently, would like to revive it though. microgrid is iterating over steps now, steps decided in grid config now, which is better.
Agents are not trading, will be next step.

Configuration Mixin is not in action, upto 400 households to be modelled, configurarable amount of RES prosumers in the grid. Data class is fixed, reasonable robust and accepting csv load profiles, 1-step functionality is depreciated currently, would like to revive it though. microgrid is iterating over steps now, steps decided in grid config now, which is better.
Run data.py as main for plots on various profiles
Agents are not trading, will be next step.
fixed battery boundaries, plots and a bunch more stuff
Utility is now posting offers, Auctioneer is now appending utility offers correctly. Only, utility offers are not yet borken up in pieces, only one house is thus able to get a bite of the cake.
